sentenceSentiment.label: neutral
sentenceSentiment.sentence: the swiss federal council adopted the dispatch on the new frontier workers agreement between Switzerland and Italy.

sentenceSentiment.label: positive
sentenceSentiment.sentence: The agreement significantly improves the current regulation on the taxation of frontier workers and contributes to maintaining the good bilateral relations between the two countries.

sentenceSentiment.label: neutral
sentenceSentiment.sentence: With the new agreement, Switzerland retains 80% of the regular withholding tax on the income of frontier workers who start working in Switzerland for the first time.

sentenceSentiment.label: neutral
sentenceSentiment.sentence: New frontier workers will also be taxed normally in Italy, whereby double taxation will be eliminated.

sentenceSentiment.label: neutral
sentenceSentiment.sentence: “New” frontier workers are individuals who enter the labour market on or after the date on which the agreement enters into force.
